title: Akaliza Keza Ntwari writes on women-led innovation - Fondation Botnar

quotes: Being launched different Requests for Proposals (RFP) in April 2024, inviting both youth-led organisations and innovators to develop solutions aligned with the priority areas set by country stakeholders.
Earth is home to over 10,000 cities; 40 years ago, half of these didn’t exist, and many of the growing cities we see today are built and developed at a rapid pace.

75% of the places that will be urbanised by 2030 are yet to be built – this offers an enormous opportunity for everyone, especially for young people, to contribute to shaping their cities for generations to come.

roles.title: Being Youth Advisor
quotes:
Oriana Ortiz Parrao
Being Youth Advisor

The first Being Global Gathering in Rabat, Morocco, brought together mental health advocates, practitioners, researchers, and young leaders to exchange insights, address implementation challenges, and explore pathways to scale.
